item.title: 本田首席执行官表示，本田将投资 650 亿美元实现电气化
item.description: 本田汽车公司首席执行官三部俊博（Toshihiro Mibe）周四表示，公司将在2030年前投资10万亿日元（648亿美元），努力向电气化转型。【原文：Honda Motor Co. will invest 10 trillion yen ($64.8 billion) by 2030 in its effort to shift toward electrification, Chief Executive Officer Toshihiro Mibe said Thursday.】

item.title: Segantii 对纳斯达克挂钩 ETF 下了 3.95 亿美元的看跌赌注
item.description: 截至 3 月底，Segantii 资本管理有限公司持有的最多美国证券是对与纳斯达克 100 指数挂钩的交易所交易基金下的 3.95 亿美元看跌赌注。【原文：Segantii Capital Management Ltd.’s top holding of US securities at the end of March was a $395 million bearish wager on an exchange-traded fund linked to the Nasdaq 100 index.】

item.title: 调查显示瑞典通胀预期低于瑞典央行目标
item.description: 根据 Prospera 在瑞典央行决定开始降息后发布的首份调查报告，固定收益投资者预计通胀率将低于瑞典央行的目标。【原文：Fixed-income investors expect inflation to undershoot the Riksbank’s target, according to the first Prospera survey published after the central bank decided to start cutting rates.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金以与战争有关为由将阿达尼港口列入黑名单
item.description: 挪威1.7万亿美元的主权财富基金决定将阿达尼港口和经济特区有限公司（Adani Ports & Special Economic Zone Ltd.）排除在其投资组合之外，理由是该公司与战争和冲突地区的侵犯人权行为存在 "不可接受 "的风险。【原文：Norway’s $1.7 trillion sovereign wealth fund has decided to exclude Adani Ports & Special Economic Zone Ltd. from its portfolio, citing “unacceptable” risks that the company is tied to human rights violations in war and conflict zones.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚银行成为最大的主权债券持有者
item.description: 印度尼西亚中央银行加入了一个独特的俱乐部：本国主权债务的最大所有者。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank has joined an exclusive club: the biggest owners of their nation’s sovereign debt.】

item.title: 苏黎世第一季度非寿险收入因保费增加而增长
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团（Zurich Insurance Group AG）称，受保费上涨的影响，第一季度财产险和意外险收入同比增长 12%。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG said revenue from property and casualty insurance rose 12% in the first quarter on a like-for-like basis, helped by higher premiums.】

item.title: 印度将外汇储备视为管理债券指数流入的主要工具
item.description: 据熟悉印度央行想法的人士称，一旦该国债券被纳入全球指数，印度庞大的外汇储备将成为抵御因预期资金流入激增而引发的任何市场波动的第一道防线。【原文：India’s vast foreign exchange reserves will be the first line of defense against any market volatility arising from an expected surge in inflows once the country’s bonds are included in global indexes, according to people familiar with the central bank’s thinking.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数期货显示创纪录涨势仍在延续
item.description: 2024年4月23日星期二，英国伦敦市，伦敦证券交易所集团公司办公中庭的一块板上显示股票价格信息。4 月 21 日（周一），富时 100 指数收盘价创下一年多来的新高，原因是近期股市波动和地缘政治风险促使投资者纷纷涌入英国基准指数中的防御性板块。摄影：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Stock price information displayed on a board at the London Stock Exchange Group Plc in the company's office atrium in the City of London, UK, on Tuesday, April 23, 2024. The FTSE 100 Index closed at a record high, on Monday, April 21, for the first time in more than a year, as recent equity market volatility and geopolitical risks prompted investors to pile into the defensive sectors that characterize the UK benchmark. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 日本经济萎缩暗示滞胀风险
item.description: 日本经济在过去三个季度中增长乏力，这表明日本经济有可能向温和的滞胀过渡，而不是向央行长期追求的正增长周期过渡。【原文：Japan’s lack of growth over the last three quarters points to the risk of a sputtering economy transitioning toward a mild bout of stagflation instead of the positive growth cycle long sought by the central bank.】

item.title: 美国收益率下降，日元摆脱干预区
item.description: 最近几周，日元正在远离引发疑似干预的区域走强，这与 2022 年美国经济数据疲软时日本官员的做法开始相似。【原文：The yen is strengthening away from areas that prompted suspected intervention in recent weeks, and it’s starting to look similar to 2022 when weaker US economic data did the job for Japanese officials.】

item.description: 由于中国市场对工厂自动化产品的需求疲软，西门子公司第二财季订单减少，收入停滞不前。【原文：Siemens AG saw orders drop and revenue stagnate in the fiscal second quarter as muted demand for factory-automation products in China continued to weigh on the German manufacturer.】

item.title: 债券收益率波动为投资者带来新的风险和机遇
item.description: 老派债券投资者正在证明，在这个动荡的新时代，并非只有快钱一族才能茁壮成长。【原文：Old-school bond investors are showing that it’s not just the fast-money crowd who can thrive in this volatile new era.】

item.title: 瑞典 SEB 银行开设苏黎世办事处，为富有的北欧外籍人士提供服务
item.description: 瑞典市值最大的银行 SEB AB 将在苏黎世开设办事处，以满足北欧地区富有的外籍人士的需求。【原文：Sweden’s largest bank by market value, SEB AB, is opening an office in Zurich to cater to wealthy expatriates from the Nordic region.】

item.title: 中国颁布规则加强对程序化交易的审查
item.description: 中国证券监管机构发布新规，加强对程序化交易的审查，为更严格地监管包括 1.6 万亿元（2,220 亿美元）量化对冲基金行业在内的机构投资者铺平了道路。【原文：China’s securities regulator published new rules to tighten scrutiny on programmed trading, paving the way for stricter supervision of institutional investors including the 1.6 trillion yuan ($222 billion) quantitative hedge fund industry.】

item.title: 中国出售创纪录数量美债显现多元化迹象
item.description: 中国在第一季度售出了创纪录数量的国债和美国机构债券，这凸显了在贸易紧张局势持续的情况下，这个亚洲国家从美国资产中分散投资的举措。【原文：China sold a record amount of Treasury and US agency bonds in the first quarter, highlighting the Asian nation’s move to diversify away from American assets as trade tensions persist.】

item.title: 今年俄罗斯柴油出口下滑的真正原因
item.description: 俄罗斯是全球最大的柴油供应国，近几个月来一直在减少柴油的出口量，因此人们普遍猜测乌克兰的无人机袭击正在减少该国炼油厂的产量。【原文：Russia, a top global supplier of diesel, has been slashing its exports of the fuel in recent months, leading to widespread speculation that Ukrainian drone attacks are cutting how much the nation’s refineries can make.】

item.title: 随着股市反弹，Michael Burry 押注中国大型科技公司
item.description: 随着中国股市触底反弹，Michael Burry 的投资公司在第一季度加倍押注于 JD.com Inc 和 Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. 。【原文：Michael Burry’s investment firm doubled down on its bets on JD.com Inc and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. in the first quarter as Chinese equities bottomed out.】

item.title: 红海中断将全球液化天然气贸易分割成不同区域
item.description: 自从一艘液化天然气油轮通过分隔阿拉伯半岛和非洲的狭窄海峡以来，已经过去四个月了。【原文：It’s been four months since a liquefied natural gas tanker has passed through the narrow strait separating the Arabian Peninsula and Africa, testament to how violent attacks there have upended global energy trade.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Ovata Capital 裁员四人，资产突破 11 亿美元
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，蓝汛资本管理公司（BlueCrest Capital Management LLP）校友詹姆斯-陈（James Chen）领导的香港对冲基金公司 Ovata Capital Management Ltd. 在资产规模突破 11 亿美元后，最近聘请了四位投资组合经理和交易员。【原文：Ovata Capital Management Ltd., the Hong Kong-based hedge fund firm led by BlueCrest Capital Management LLP alumnus James Chen, recently hired four portfolio managers and traders after boosting assets past $1.1 billion, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 印度大选中值得关注的关键选区
item.description: 印度大选已经过半，各主要政党之间的竞选活动也像全国各地飙升的气温一样不断升温。【原文：India’s election is past the halfway mark, with campaigning between the main political parties heating up just like the soaring temperatures across the country.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老基金在资产管理费问题上玩硬的
item.description: 澳大利亚蓬勃发展的 3.7 万亿澳元（约合 2.5 万亿美元）养老金行业在资产管理费问题上表现出了强硬的谈判姿态，因为数据显示这些基金支付的费用往往比其他基金低很多。【原文：Australia’s booming A$3.7 trillion ($2.5 trillion) pensions industry is proving a tough negotiator on asset management fees, as data reveals the funds often pay significantly less than others.】

item.title: 中国房地产股因购房建议而大涨
item.description: 中国开发商的股价跳涨，原因是他们乐观地认为，中国政府将提供政策支持，购买不良建筑商未售出的房屋。【原文：The shares of Chinese developers jumped on optimism that Beijing will provide policy support for the purchase of unsold homes from distressed builders.】

item.title: 中国垃圾美元债券价格升至 2021 年以来最高点
item.description: 在政府努力支撑受重创的房地产行业之际，中国的垃圾美元债券涨至三年来的最高水平。【原文：China’s junk dollar bonds are rallying to their highest level in three years amid government efforts to shore up the bruised property sector.】

item.title: 新加坡航空公司员工获得近八个月工资的奖金
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，新加坡航空公司（Singapore Airlines Ltd.）在连续第二年实现创纪录的年度利润后，将向员工发放价值近八个月工资的奖金。【原文：Singapore Airlines Ltd. will reward staff with a bonus payout worth almost eight months of salary, according to a person familiar with the matter, after delivering a second consecutive record annual profit.】

item.title: 银行称对冲基金做空澳元的押注有可能适得其反
item.description: 对冲基金毫不怀疑澳元将走低。澳大利亚最大的银行却不敢苟同。【原文：Hedge funds have little doubt that the Australian dollar is headed lower. The nation’s biggest banks beg to differ.】

item.title: 德莱弗斯竞购 Namoi 引发澳大利亚竞争担忧
item.description: 澳大利亚监管机构担心，路易达孚公司（Louis Dreyfus Co.【原文：Australia’s regulator raised concerns that Louis Dreyfus Co.’s proposed takeover of Namoi Cotton Ltd. will likely reduce competition for processing services for some of the nation’s growers.】

item.title: 新加坡航空公司盈利创纪录，员工将获得近 8 个月的奖金：新加坡航空公司
item.description: 据《海峡时报》援引新加坡航空公司首席执行官吴俊峰（Goh Choon Phong）的公告报道，包括飞行员在内的新加坡航空公司员工可能会获得 7.94 个月的利润分享奖金。【原文：Singapore Airlines Ltd. staff, including pilots, may get a profit-sharing bonus of 7.94 months, the Straits Times reported, citing an announcement it had seen from chief executive officer Goh Choon Phong.】
